Posts.Content: what is DCIS? I just had adouble masectomy on July 31st. It was painful, but the drugs helped, I had partial reconstruction with trans flap It was a 9 hour surgery. Ididstart driving after a week (stopped the painmeds), I still dont have full range of motion in my left arm but therapy is helping,
Posts.Title: looking for someone who can tell me about pain and mastectomy
looking for someone who can tell me about pain and mastectomy

Posts.Content: I thought I was the only one bothered by this! It is annoying that every few minutes I have to see these commercials especially since I am trying to watch TV to relax and forget about it for a few minutes each day! It really bothers my children too! And cancer most certainly is not a blessing maybe an eye opener but definitely think of better blessings!
Posts.Title: BC Commercials...Ranting!
